description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Grand Class Melee is a 4-player action game centered around multiplayer combat. Advance through 8 different rounds of combat and 60 unique character classes to achieve victory.  Combine your class's ability with abilities you've gained in previous rounds to create hundreds of ability combinations and strategies to suit your combat style!
